[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5545acdb63687228ef5d2400#post_5545acdb63687228ef5d2400
Wait really? [/bq]
Yeah; that's how antelopes are able to outrun them because cheetahs are designed to run fast; antelopes run criss cross and cheetahs can't turn fast enough.

If you're ever getting chased by a cheetah run fast as you can then make a sharp 90 degree turn right in front of a building and the cheetah will smash it's face into the building.
